quantitative.question: إذا كان س + 5 = 12، فما قيمة س؟
ما مساحة المستطيل الذي طوله 8 سم وعرضه 6 سم؟

verbal.question: ما معنى كلمة 'مثابر'؟
verbal.explanation: مثابر تعني مجتهد ومستمر في العمل

verbal.question: أي من الكلمات التالية تعني عكس 'كبير'؟
أي من الجمل التالية صحيحة نحوياً؟
verbal.explanation: الطالب يذهب إلى المدرسة - الجملة صحيحة نحوياً

verbal.question: ما معنى العبارة 'الوقت كالسيف إن لم تقطعه قطعك'؟
verbal.explanation: المثل يعني أن الوقت ثمين ويجب استغلاله وإلا فات

english.question: Choose the correct form: 'I ___ to school every day.'
What is the opposite of 'expensive'?
english.explanation: The opposite of expensive is cheap

english.question: Complete: 'If I ___ time, I would help you.'
english.explanation: Second conditional uses 'had' for the if clause

english.question: What does 'procrastinate' mean?
english.explanation: Procrastinate means to delay or postpone doing something

sentenceCompletion.sentence: The scientist's discovery was a major ______ in the field of medicine.
She showed great ______ when dealing with difficult clients.
The company needs to ______ its outdated policies to stay competitive.
His ______ approach to problem-solving impressed the entire team.
The research team will ______ the data before drawing conclusions.
The new technology will ______ how we communicate with each other.
The student's ______ understanding of the subject was evident in her presentation.
The manager had to ______ the difficult decision to restructure the department.
The artist's work ______ the beauty of nature in a unique way.
The team will ______ the project requirements before starting work.
The government must ______ the environmental impact of the new policy.
The teacher's ______ explanation helped students understand the complex concept.
The company will ______ its operations to several new countries.
The researcher's findings ______ the previous theories about the phenomenon.
The team needs to ______ a new strategy for the upcoming project.
The new software will ______ the company's productivity significantly.
The committee will ______ the proposal before making a final decision.
The student's ______ analysis of the data impressed the professor.
The organization will ______ its mission to serve the community better.
The team must ______ the challenges they face to succeed.
The teacher tried to ______ the students to participate more in class.
The company will ______ its resources to support the new initiative.
The student's ______ understanding of the material was impressive.
The company will ______ its operations to improve efficiency.
The researcher's ______ approach to the problem yielded innovative solutions.
The team's ______ performance led to their victory in the competition.
The scientist's ______ research contributed to major medical breakthroughs.
The organization will ______ its goals through strategic planning.
The teacher's ______ feedback helped students improve their work.
The team will ______ the project timeline to accommodate new requirements.
The researcher's ______ insights opened new avenues for investigation.
The company must ______ its financial resources to survive the crisis.
The team will ______ the project timeline to meet the deadline.
The student's ______ presentation demonstrated mastery of the subject.
The organization will ______ its services to reach more people.
The researcher's ______ methodology ensured reliable results.
The team's ______ approach to problem-solving was highly effective.
The researcher's ______ findings challenged existing theories.
The teacher's ______ teaching style engaged all students.
The company will ______ its market share through innovative products.
The student's ______ approach to learning impressed the teachers.
The committee will ______ the proposal at next week's meeting.
The new policy will ______ all employees to work from home.
The teacher asked students to ______ their answers with specific examples.
The company's success depends on its ability to ______ to changing market conditions.
The doctor's ______ diagnosis saved the patient's life.
The team worked together to ______ their goal of winning the championship.
The research study will ______ the effects of climate change on agriculture.
The new technology will ______ the way we communicate with each other.
The professor asked students to ______ the main points of the lecture.
